data.title: Physiological and Morphological Specific Features of the Formation of the Thyroid Status in the Aboriginal and Migrant Populations of Magadan Oblast
data.meta_description: Ultrasonographic determinations of the thyroid gland volumes and measurement of the blood plasma content of thyroxin and triiodothyronine were carried out
data.text:
